name: Get It!
description:
Get it? is a relaxing comedian simulator where you pick people from the street and tell them jokes that they might find amusing based on their appearance.

Warning: This game is only in Spanish. Sorry!

Background

Your goal is to raise enough money to pay your rent for your small appartment. Then you can use the remaining money to buy fancy stuff to decorate!

Controls

You can play using only the Left click!

Screenshots Credit

Get it? was developed by Isaac Prieto, Kailun Cai, Juan Ignacio González and Daniel Pérez.
